A freelance HTML & CSS architect

Accepting new projects starting July 2015

If you want me to get all excited about your project, hire me to do your HTML & CSS in a modular and scalable architecture.

You can hire me as developer, consultant and as a trainer to get your in-house team up-to-date with Responsive Web Design.

My skill set contains: Responsive and Adaptive web design, accessibility, usability, front-end performance and UX. I like to build your project with HTML5, CSS3, Sass and a lethal dose of progressive enhancement.

Before we get going, I think its worth stating that I am no hardcore JavaScript programmer.
